summary: A Tribe Called Quest was a popular American hip-hop group from Queens, New York, formed in 1985. The original members were Q-Tip, Phife Dawg, Ali Shaheed Muhammad, and Jarobi White. They were known for mixing jazz with hip-hop and were part of the Native Tongues collective. Their albums, like *The Low End Theory* and *Midnight Marauders*, were very successful and influenced many other musicians. The group broke up in 1998 but reunited in 2006. They released their final album, *We Got It from Here... Thank You 4 Your Service*, in 2016, which was a big success. A Tribe Called Quest is considered one of the best hip-hop groups and will be inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 2024.
title: A Tribe Called Quest
